subject: Hallo!
body:
Hi there lovely,
I was asearching the net few days ago. I am new to this thing.
and saw your profile. I decided to email you cause I found 
you attractive. I might come down to your city in few weeks.
Let me know if we can meetb each other in person.
I am attractibve girl. I aam sure you won't regret it.
Reply to my personal email at fmsbz@MailVisionWorld.info
